COMMON.NOT_CONFIRMED_DESC:
We take the security of our members very seriously; therefore you are currently stuck in limited-access mode...
To gain full access, 3 members within your regional HackPack must confirm you. Speed up the process by filling out your profile, adding location, languages and stories to your portfolio, then finding colleagues.

LANDING.TITLE: The global network for the media industry
LANDING.SLOGAN: Strengthening independent journalism to better inform the public about our world
LANDING.ROLES: Editors, Fixers, Story Ideas, Photographers, Experts, Videographers, Journalists, Quotes

SNAPS.TITLE: Latest Posts
SNAPS.DESC: We’re connecting you with gigs, story ideas, events, quotes, and each other!

JOURNALISTS.TITLE: Journalists
JOURNALISTS.PHRASE_1: Cover what you want, where you want
JOURNALISTS.PHRASE_2: Connect with the right editor or fixer
JOURNALISTS.PHRASE_3: Save time as PR members chase comments
JOURNALISTS.PHRASE_4: Get your hands on an endless rolodex

PRS.TITLE: PR Professionals
PRS.PHRASE_1: Identify all journalists covering your industry
PRS.PHRASE_2: Receive daily updates for quote requests
PRS.PHRASE_3: Distribute press releases to interested journalists
PRS.PHRASE_4: Read reviews of journalists before collaborating

CONNECT_RAPIDLY.TITLE: Connect Rapidly
CONNECT_RAPIDLY.DESC: Search the database of specialized profiles and find the right person based upon their portfolio, designated colleagues and subjective feedback.

CHOOSE_CONFIDENTLY.TITLE: Choose Confidently
CHOOSE_CONFIDENTLY.DESC: Read reviews by colleagues before collaborating with a member to ensure you choose the right candidate for you.

DO_MORE_WITH_LESS.TITLE: Do more with less
DO_MORE_WITH_LESS.DESC: Expand your coverage while diminishing your costs and increase your list of sources with no extra work.

SECURE.TITLE: Work securely
SECURE.DESC: Engage with a community of vetted professionals, where members and regional administrators approve new members. Then set your privacy settings to control who sees your identity.

PROFESSIONALS_AROUND_THE_WORLD.TITLE: We are just growing, but already global

0.NAME: Alec Luhn
0.ROLE: Freelance reporter for The Guardian & Foreign Policy
0.TEXT: In a relatively short time, HackPack has become a valuable resource. Through it I was able to connect with a local journalist at the #ElectricYerevan protests in Armenia & with journalists & fixers in St. Petersburg.

1.NAME: Erica Alini
1.ROLE: Deputy Managing Editor, Monitor Global Outlook
1.TEXT: I spent weeks looking for a solid Moscow-based business reporter without success. HackPack found the perfect candidate in just a few days.

2.NAME: Igor Serebryany
2.TEXT: HackPack was an instantaneous and landslide of a success in my hunt for employees at our office. In less than one week, I found three candidates, one of which has already begun working full-time.

FOOTER.CREATORS: Designed and built with all the love in the world by

SIGNIN.RESET_PASSWORD_DESC: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll email you a link to reset your password.
SIGNIN.PASSWORD_RESET_DESC: You've got mail. We just sent instructions for resetting your password.

CONFIG_PROFILE.WELCOME_DESC: Think of us as the airbnb for the news industry, but you find journalists instead of apartments. We keep registration short and simple, so within a minute you can make the connections you need.
CONFIG_PROFILE.ROLE_DESC: Later you can select Secondary roles, but this is what you consider your primary role.
CONFIG_PROFILE.EMAIL_DESC: Your social media account didn’t provide an email. To ensure you receive messages from members, be sure to include your email account.

RULES_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Welcome back to HackPack
RULES_CONFIRMATION.DESC: We’ve changed our “Privacy Policy“ and “Terms of Use since“ last time you were on the site. Before continuing on to HackPack, make sure to review and confirm them.
RULES_CONFIRMATION.BONUS_DESC: Your privacy is very important to us, check out the HackPack blog to see what else we do to ensure you and your data stay safe.

EMAIL_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: You’re almost there
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION.DESC: We sent you a letter. Now check ({{ email }}) to confirm the email address, and you’ll be a part of the network.

SECURE.LABEL: Secure
SECURE.DESC: Only colleagues can view your real name, portfolio, social media links, references and about me. You choose who sees your real name when sending messages.

TOP_SECRET.LABEL: Top Secret
TOP_SECRET.DESC: All non-colleagues only see your pseudonym, profile pic and role on your profile. You do not appear within any search.

PSEUDONYM.TITLE: Pseudonym
PSEUDONYM.DESC: All members will view this name until you have confirmed them as colleagues or choose to send a message with your real name.

LOCATION_DEFINED.TITLE: It looks like you are located in {{ location }}. Is this correct?

0.TITLE: Select your Risk Tolerance
0.DESC: Designate the level of physical and political risk you are willing to take for a story

1.TITLE: Basic Journalism
1.DESC: This Risk Tolerance demonstrates a desire to work on stories that are far away from violence, such as sport, business, fashion, IT, editing etc.

2.TITLE: Gettin’ Feet Wet
2.DESC: At this level, you are interested in reporting in the field, but not willing to go to a conflict zone. Rallies with little likelihood of arrests are ok.

3.TITLE: Violence Gloves Off
3.DESC: You’ve taken precautions and are ready to report at political protests with riot police and orderly conflicts after the frontline has stopped moving.

4.TITLE: Conflict Reporting
4.DESC: Oftentimes for photographers and videographers willing to get a shot of the fighting or a fixer ready to help on politically dangerous topics in a very risky country. Be sure to take the necessary precautions for safety.

FEEDBACK.MY_PAGE_NO_ITEMS_DESC: This is the Colleague Feedback, allowing you to provide constructive information on how to improve as well as provide insight to other members as they decide to work with someone
FEEDBACK.NOT_COLLEAGUES_NO_ITEMS_DESC: This member has yet to be reviewed. Add each other as colleagues to leave feedback and help others decide whether they want to work together
FEEDBACK.COLLEAGUES_NO_ITEMS_DESC: This member has yet to be reviewed. Be the first one!
FEEDBACK.CANT_POST_FEEDBACK_DESC: This member has yet to be reviewed.

COMPANY_NAME.TITLE: Organization Name
COMPANY_NAME.DESC: Looks like you’re the first one. Write the Organization’s official name below, and you will begin as administrator of the page. After completing your profile, help by working on your organization’s profile as well.

COMPANY_WEBSITE.TITLE: Organization Website
COMPANY_WEBSITE.DESC: Place your organization’s website below, and we’ll automatically link you to it. If you’re the first member of your team on the site, you can create the organization’s page.

NEW_MEMBERS.TITLE: New members
NEW_MEMBERS.HINT: Here you control who becomes a member of your HackPack. Simply press Hack to confirm, Flack to reject or Skip if unsure. It takes 3 members to confirm, but be sure before confirming.
